name: ForTheGoldPanty
description:
Baby sponges go for panties !

Your baby sponge will start to expand since the game begins.

Expand bigger, jump higher.

When keep pressing 'Rebirth', you will give birth to many many baby sponges.

All sponges will become your ladder to bounce for triumph.

Create a sea of sponges, make some waves and fight for panties! Whoever wins get the gold panty on his head.
